message.content: {"id": "18705", "title": "Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example", "description": "The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing.", "OB": "The entire area of the outermost frames is getting repainted.", "EB": "Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted.", "SR": "Modify the code to repaint only the necessary area of the outermost frames to reduce flashing."}

origin.input_prompt:
